diploma.desc1: The Aptitude Certificate is a key qualification awarded by Zaytouni educational institutions, reflecting an advanced stage in the academic path. Students earn it after completing a rigorous curriculum focused on Sharia, Arabic, and supporting sciences like logic and rhetoric. It demonstrates mastery of core subjects and readiness for higher levels of study. This stage includes advanced studies in Fiqh, Tafsir, Hadith, and Grammar.
diploma.desc2: The Achievement Certificate marks a higher academic level. It is awarded to students who demonstrate deep understanding of Islamic and linguistic sciences, and proficiency in research and analysis. This certificate qualifies students for teaching or religious guidance and is an official recognition of scholarly competence. It emphasizes comparative fiqh, usul al-fiqh, hadith sciences, and advanced text interpretation aligned with modern contexts.
